text: karunvada, firavnvada, hamanvada (api me andamatama vinasa kara dæmuvemu). niyata vasayenma musa movun veta pæhædili sadhakayanma genævit sitiyeya. ehet movun (ovunva pratiksepa kara dama) bhumiyehi unangu vi katayutu kala bævin (apage danduvamata goduru vuha. eyin) ovunta berimata nohæki viya
